quotes.text: Goth Juice... The most powerful hairspray known to man. Made from the tears of Robert Smith.
quotes.author: Vince Noir

quotes.text: Under closer inspection I realised it was a funky ball of tits from outer space.
quotes.author: Old Gregg

quotes.text: I don't accessorize. I'm Howard Moon. There's a simple truth to me.
quotes.author: Howard Moon

quotes.text: You haven't seen my mate Howard, have you? Kinda tall, scruffy hair, small eyes like a crab?
quotes.author: Vince Noir

quotes.text: Don't kill me, I've got so much to give!
quotes.author: Howard Moon

quotes.text: Aagh! It hurts! It burns! You've liquified me, you slags!
quotes.author: The Hitcher

quotes.text: When you are the moon, the best form you can be is a full moon. And then the half moon... he's all right. But the full moon is the famous moon. And then three-quarters, eh, no one gives a shit about him. When does he come, two days in, to the calendar month? He's useless. Full moon. The moon. The main moon.
quotes.author: The Moon

quotes.text: One time, I saw a man looking at me, yes, with his eyes. And then, he, he picked up a tube. And he looked, in the tube, and he made the moon big, inside the tube. The moon big inside a tube!
quotes.author: The Moon

quotes.text: The tie's a multi purpose accessory, y'know, belt, school boy, Rambo.
quotes.author: Vince Noir

quotes.text: Two hundred years inside that box! For crimes against humanity! That's right, ladies and gentlemen, I raped a dolphin. But technically it was a porpoise. But one blow-hole's the same as the next to me!
quotes.author: The Hitcher

quotes.text: I'm going to Jazzercise. Working out to hot be-bop. Circuit training to John Coltrane.
quotes.author: Howard Moon

quotes.text: I don't pick stuff up, I knock stuff down!
quotes.author: Vince Noir

quotes.text: You enjoy that boy? Cockney urine all over your face?
quotes.author: The Hitcher

quotes.text: Want to come to a club where people wee on each other?
quotes.author: Old Gregg

quotes.text: Some say Old Gregg is like a big fish finger, but big like, umm... like a garage. As big as a garage. Imagine a fish finger as big as a garage! Oooh, it's a big one!
quotes.author: The Moon

quotes.text: You ever go to a club where people wee on each other?
quotes.author: Old Gregg

quotes.text: Who are you, dealing out stories in chunks? Johnny Segment?
quotes.author: Howard Moon

quotes.text: I'll take you out for a meal with Mr and Mrs. Pain. Order up some violent quiche.
quotes.author: Howard Moon

quotes.text: Easy now my fuzzy little man peach.
quotes.author: Old Gregg

quotes.text: I haven't got anything inside, I'm like a beach ball.
quotes.author: Vince Noir
